issue.title: Fix cmake warning and msvc debug asserts
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1057](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1057). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- Fix dependency target for "arrow_objlib".
- Fix debug asserts in tests.
